name: Brew House
title: Craft Beer Specialist
description: Home of the finest craft beers. We specialize in locally brewed craft beers and imported premium lagers. Our selection includes IPAs, stouts, ales, and seasonal specialties.

name: Vine & Wine Co
title: Premium Wine Collection
description: Your destination for exquisite wines from around the world. From elegant Chardonnays to bold Cabernets, we offer a curated selection of premium wines.

name: Spirits Corner
title: Premium Spirits & Whiskey
description: Specializing in premium spirits including whiskey, bourbon, scotch, and rum. We carry rare editions and aged spirits for the discerning connoisseur.

name: Crystal Vodka Emporium
title: Vodka Specialists
description: Your premier source for premium vodka. From classic Russian vodkas to modern craft distillations, we offer the finest selection.

name: Gin Gardens
title: Artisan Gin Collection
description: Discover the world of premium gins. From London Dry to craft small-batch gins, we feature unique botanical blends from master distillers.

name: Cocktail Central
title: Cocktail Mixes & Kits
description: Everything you need for perfect cocktails at home. Premium mixes, garnishes, and complete cocktail kits for every occasion.

name: New Spirits Outlet
title: Budget Liquor Store
description: Affordable spirits and liquor for everyone. We offer great prices on popular brands.
